edge: In ancient Egypt, Princess Ahmanet made a deal with the deity Set to gain demonic powers through a ceremonial dagger. She murdered her family and attempted to set the deity free, but was caught and mummified alive by Egyptian priests for her crimes.

Dr. Henry Jekyll takes over the operation to discover the tomb of a crusader knight who was buried with an Egyptian ruby in present-day London, and during the flight to Britain with Ahmanet's sarcophagus, Chris is possessed by Ahmanet through a spider bite.
Dr. Henry Jekyll takes over the operation to discover the tomb of a crusader knight who was buried with an Egyptian ruby in present-day London.

Set takes over Nick's body after he stabs himself with the dagger, but Ahmanet tries to stop him. Set allows Nick to regain control when he remembers Jenny and Jekyll's words and uses Set's powers to extract Ahmanet's life force, killing her.
Set possesses Nick after he stabs himself with the dagger, but Nick still struggles against Set's control. Set allows Nick to regain control when he remembers Jenny and Jekyll's words.
Ahmanet tries to stop Set from taking over Nick's body after he stabs himself with the dagger, but Nick still resurrects her and then seals her back in her sarcophagus.
Nick remembers Jenny's words before using Set's powers to extract Ahmanet's life force, killing her. Nick resurrects Jenny after he says goodbye to her and vanishes.
Nick remembers Jekyll's words before using Set's powers to extract Ahmanet's life force, killing her. Jenny and Jekyll wonder whether Nick, now fused with Set, will use his powers for good.
Nick resurrects Chris when he goes on an adventure with him to find a cure to remove the curse.
